name: Cumulative effect
text: §46-113  Cumulative effect.  Neither this part nor anything contained in this part shall be construed as a restriction or limitation upon any power which a county might otherwise have under any law of this State, but shall be construed as cumulative.  The authorization granted may be carried out by the county council acting at any regular or special meeting. [L 1985, c 267, pt of §1]
